author: Cloud

text:
All hail the gods at From Software. One of the few companies in this industry not trying to cash in on what's hot and focused on making compelling titles they themselves want to experience. Hidetaka Miyazaki has gone on record saying he made the game so hard because he's a masochist, and wants to suffer in ways the game dishes out.

He's also more humble and upset when it comes to performance issues, feeling sorry for fans for Blighttown. Now if only Bethesda expressed such feelings for Skyrim..

author: Benboudaoudinho Stanfield

text:
I suggest turning back if you don't want any spoilers, but that should be the case for any of my videos.

After giving it some thoughts, Dark Souls is my favorite game of this generation and the only one in my Top 10 of all time. I've already explained some of the reasons why in the last Castlevania IV upload (with its similarities that I miss in newer games). Finally reaching Gwyn, no dialogues (words weren't needed) and the fight starting as this music plays is something I'll always remember.
author: SupraDarky
